verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Nimezunguka sana dunia hii,
kulitafuta pambo hili.
Pambo la moyo wangu nimelipata
Nimepata mke mwema.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Iyelele iyelele vigelegele makofi (piga) makofi.
Ni raha tu, ni raha tu, pambo nimelipata.
Iyelele, iyelele vigelegele midundo (cheza) midundo.
mchaka mchaka mchaka mchaka, pambo la moyo wangu.

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Karibuni wapenzi tufurahie,
tule tunywe tucheze ni furaha.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Ninakuacha baba nawe mama ,naambatana naye mke wangu.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Leo yametimia maandiko,
yale yalionenwa aleluya.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Njooni tuserebuke kwa midundo,
tule tunywe tucheze ni furaha.
